section.section: The Council shall appoint an Executive Director qualified by training and experience.
The Executive Director is the chief administrative and planning officer and regular technical advisor of the Council.

text.section: The Executive Director serves at the pleasure of the Council.

section.section: The Council shall establish the powers and duties of the Executive Director.
The Executive Director appoints and removes the staff of the Council.

text.section: The Executive Director is entitled to the compensation that the Council sets.
